pythagoras.f
Class FloatMath

java.lang.Object
  pythagoras.f.FloatMath

public class FloatMath
extends Object

Utility methods and constants for single-precision floating point math.

mean - the desired mean.

lerpa

public static float lerpa(float a1,
                          float a2,
                          float t)
Linearly interpolates between two angles, taking the shortest path around the circle. This assumes that both angles are in [-pi, +pi].

setToStringDecimalPlaces

public static void setToStringDecimalPlaces(int places)
Sets the number of decimal places to show when formatting values. By default, they are formatted to three decimal places.

toString

public static String toString(float value)
Formats the supplied floating point value, truncated to the currently configured number of decimal places. The value is also always preceded by a sign (e.g. +1.0 or -0.5).
